meanings.definition: A variant form of an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: The isoenzyme in this experiment showed a different shape than the original enzyme.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the isoenzyme to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The isoenzyme decided to try a new hairstyle to stand out from the other enzymes.
meanings.sent4: The isoenzyme danced around the cell, bringing a fresh energy to the reaction.
meanings.sent5: The isoenzyme glowed brightly under the microscope, revealing its distinct structure.

meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the same reaction but differ in amino acid sequence.
meanings.sent1: Researchers compared the isoenzymes to see how they functioned in the body.
meanings.sent2: The isoenzyme played a crucial role in breaking down sugars in the cell.
meanings.sent3: At the enzyme party, the isoenzyme told jokes that only other enzymes could understand.
meanings.sent4: The isoenzyme race to the finish line symbolized the competition between different amino acid sequences.
meanings.sent5: In the enzyme factory, the isoenzyme worked tirelessly to keep the production line running smoothly.
